about_the_game:
In (para)Normal Commute, you get thrown into the first person of your average office worker, simply trying to make your way home using any means necessary. Things turn sour when you arrive at London's Elephant & Castle subway station and fancy taking a cat nap while waiting for your connection train...

After awakening, all the lights are out. You are left with nothing but your thoughts, trusty phone torch, and complete darkness... or so it seems. If the eerie darkness doesn't get you, something or someone sure will! Run for your life, through various station tunnels and modes of transport, solving puzzles and finding secrets to make your way home safely without being bitten, bruised, or well, to put it lightly... dead. You will be challenged.

The controls are simple enough to anyone who has played a FPS game before, use W, S, A, and D keys for movement and mouse for looking and interacting with in-game and user interface elements, a full list of controls can be found in the settings menu after launching the game.

Happy commuting! ;)

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes blood, gore, and levels which display death and threat.

detailed_description:
In (para)Normal Commute, you get thrown into the first person of your average office worker, simply trying to make your way home using any means necessary. Things turn sour when you arrive at London's Elephant & Castle subway station and fancy taking a cat nap while waiting for your connection train...

After awakening, all the lights are out. You are left with nothing but your thoughts, trusty phone torch, and complete darkness... or so it seems. If the eerie darkness doesn't get you, something or someone sure will! Run for your life, through various station tunnels and modes of transport, solving puzzles and finding secrets to make your way home safely without being bitten, bruised, or well, to put it lightly... dead. You will be challenged.

The controls are simple enough to anyone who has played a FPS game before, use W, S, A, and D keys for movement and mouse for looking and interacting with in-game and user interface elements, a full list of controls can be found in the settings menu after launching the game.

Happy commuting! ;)

name: (para)Normal Commute

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(R) i5 11400F @ 2.6GHz
  • Graphics: AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Nvidia / Realtek or equivalent
  • VR Support: No VR support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(R) i9 11900K @ 3.5GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Nvidia / Realtek or equivalent
  • VR Support: No VR support

short_description: (para)Normal Commute makes your everyday sardine-packed commute seem like a refreshing walk along a sunny beach... Solve puzzles and overcome challenges to complete your commute safely in this short first person puzzling journey!
